item.title: Probability in the real world*
item.description: 1 Probability refresher 2 Objection! Mathematical error your honour 3 Health problems 4 Scientists have discoveredâ€¦ div#TOC li { list-style:none; background-image:none; background-repeat:none; background-position:0; } 1 Probability refresher 1.1 What even is it? Probability: Use known state of the world to predict the data we should observe. I have a fair coin (known state of the world) and can expect 50 heads and 50 tails, on average, from 100 flips (predicted data).

item.title: Lizards playing rock, paper, scissors*
item.description: 1 Rock, paper, scissors 2 Side Blotched Lizards 3 Agent-based modeling div#TOC li { list-style:none; background-image:none; background-repeat:none; background-position:0; } This article was inspired by this post, which I attempted to recreate and extend. If you want to see the full code for this post then you can find the .Rmd file here. 1 Rock, paper, scissors Aim: Simulate simple rock, paper, scissors game to visualise a simple evolutionary process.
